name: Aidoku Source
subtitle: Home of Aidoku, free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS
description:
This is the AltStore Source for Aidoku, free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS.

For full details on what's included, check the website: https://aidoku.app/

apps.name: Aidoku
apps.subtitle: Free and open source manga reader for iOS and iPadOS
apps.localizedDescription: A free and open source manga reading application for iOS and iPadOS.

privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Aidoku needs FaceID permissions for user-defined settings
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Aidoku needs permission to save pages in your photo library
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Aidoku needs permission to connect to local Komga servers
